content: It seems like there's been an increase of people saying questionable/inappropriate/suggestively inappropriate things in the studio, and I think we need to take a better approach. I reminded the studio twice today in the few hours I was on to keep things appropriate, as there was some inappropriate stuff. In addition, I'm unsure if us removing users who violate guidelines really works, as a user who was recently removed is still active and saying some pretty rude things (...)
